tool_description: The powerful interface delivers extensive information about countries across the globe.
name: Countryman API
title: Countryman API

api_list.name: Exports volume
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries/AF/details/exportsVolume"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{id}/details/exportsVolume"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List of all cities in a specific state
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of all cities in a specific state. The state is identified by its state code and it must belong to the country identified by the given database ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries/ZW/states/HA/cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{id}/states/{statecode}/cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List of states
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of all states belonging to a specific country, identified by its database ID
api_list.code:

url = "https://countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries/ZW/states"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Country by Name
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves information about a specific country by its name
api_list.code:

url = "https://countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries/name/Rwanda"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Specific Country
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves information about a specific country by its database ID. The returned country information excludes state details.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries/ZW"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Countries
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of all countries stored in the database. Country details are excluded in the response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countryman-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
